name: Dragon Slayer (itch) (NcsAsp)
description:
This is a short game that I made for Minijam #113. The theme was 'Final Boss' and the limitation was 'Stuck in a Loop.' Feel free to play and enjoy the game.

As of the time of writing, the game's story is finished. The only thing I did not add, is images. I had a few prepared, but I felt it would take too long to finish them, and so I removed them. At some point I may go back and re-add them to the game to make it look better, but by the time the jam is finished , they will not be present in the game.
